instruction: move all the balls into the dustpan as fast as you can

query.query: What is the most efficient way to collect all the balls?

selection.A: Pick the balls to the dustpan one by one
selection.B: Use the pivot to collect all the balls

response.reasoning: Based on the scene, sweeping all the balls into the dustpan at once is faster and more efficient than picking them up individually.
From the images, it looks like pushing or sweeping the balls with the pivot into the dustpan is faster and more efficient than picking them up individually.
Sweeping with the pivot allows collecting them all at once rather than tediously picking them up ball by ball.
Sweeping all of the balls in together using the pivot technique (rather than picking them one by one) is the quicker and more efficient approach to collect them into the dustpan.
